Title: Relates to aggravated cruelty to animals during an incident of domestic violence
Summary: Authorizes a lengthier prison sentence for a person who commits aggravated cruelty to animals during an incident of domestic violence.
LawCode: Amd ยง353-a, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to aggravated cruelty to animals during an incident of domestic violence
